name: Violetta Dress up Games
description:
This time we bring you one of our best games Violetta dress up games, today's game we will dress as we like Violeta.
We give you lots of options to dress as Violeta.
We can choose different hairstyles, we can make up, we can choose from many accessories for both the hair to face.

Feature:
* Simple and comfortable to play.
* All colors and sizes for Violetta.
* Music Fun.
* Take photo to Violetta.
* Discover More free dress up games.
* Comment on how much you love your favorite star.

How you will dress Violetta today?
This game is all the rage!
